tuv.seg: The Universal Social Charge (USC) has replaced the income levy from 1 January 2011
Mar sin féin, ríomhtar an tobhach ioncaim nua as féin ó cháin ioncaim
A new Universal Social Charge was announced in Budget 2011 that replaced both the income levy and the health levy from 1 January 2011
Déantar é a ghearradh ar an ollioncam atá agat roimh asbhaintí, mar shampla, liúntais chaipitil nó ranníocaíochtaí pinsean
Medical card holders who were previously exempt from the income levy may have to pay the USC
Ní féidir leat asbhaintí nó creidmheasanna a éileamh chun méid an tobhaigh a íocann tú a laghdú
You can find out more about the Universal Social Charge in Revenue's Frequently Asked Questions document (pdf)
Más cáiníocóir ÍMAT tú, bíonn freagracht ar d’fhostóir an tobhach a asbhaint ón bpá a íoctar leat
It was charged on your gross income, before deductions, for example, capital allowances or contributions to pensions
Nuair a fhágann tú post, ba chóir duit Deimhniú Tobhaigh Ioncaim (pdf) a fháil ó d’fhostóir
The levy is collected from your gross income
Beidh an deimhniú seo agat mar thaifead duit féin
If you were a PAYE taxpayer your employer was responsible for deducting the levy from your wages
Tabhair faoi deara: Ón 1 Eanáir 2011 tá an Muirear Sóisialta Uilíoch (MSU) tar éis an tobhach ioncaim a athchur
You got an End of year - Income levy Certificate (pdf) if you were in employment
Tabhair faoi deara: Fógraíodh Muirear Sóisialta Uilíoch nua i mBuiséad 2011 atá tar éis an tobhach ioncaim agus an tobhach sláinte a athchur ón 1 Eanáir 2011
When you left a job you should have got an Income Levy Certificate (pdf) from your employer
Seans go mbeidh ar shealbhóirí cárta leighis a bhí díolmhaithe ón tobhach ioncaim roimhe sin an MSU a íoc
This certificate is for your own records
Is féidir leat tuilleadh a fháil amach faoin Muirear Sóisialta Uilíoch sa doiciméad um Cheisteanna Coitianta na gCoimisinéirí Ioncaim (pdf)
The income levy was payable on gross income from most sources before any tax reliefs, capital allowances, losses, pension contributions or PRSI
Tá an tobhach ioncaim iníoctha ar ollioncam ó bheagnach gach foinse roimh aon fhaoiseamh cánach, liúntais chaipitil, caillteanais, ranníocaíochtaí pinsean nó ÁSPC
You had to pay the income levy if:
Caithfear an tobhach ioncaim a íoc sna cúinsí a leanas:
• You were under 65 and your gross income was above €15,028 per year or €289 per week
• Tá tú faoi 65 bliana d’aois agus ollioncam agat atá os cionn €15,028 sa bhliain nó €289 sa tseachtain
• You were aged 65 or over and your annual gross income was more than €20,000 for a single person or €40,000 for a married couple
• Tá tú 65 bliana d’aois nó níos sine agus ollioncam bliantúil agat atá níos mó ná €20,000 i gcás duine aonair nó €40,000 i gcás lánúin phósta
You did not pay the income levy if you:
Ní íoctar an tobhach ioncaim sna cúinsí a leanas:
• Were under 65 with an annual gross income not more than a specified limit
• Tá tú faoi 65 bliana d’aois agus ollioncam bliantúil agat nach bhfuil níos mó ná teorainn shonraithe
• Were aged 65 or over with an annual gross income not more than €20,000 for a single individual or €40,000 for a married couple
• Tá tú 65 bliana d’aois nó níos sine le hollioncam bliantúil nach bhfuil níos mó ná €20,000 i gcás duine aonair nó €40,000 i gcás lánúin phósta
• Had a full medical card
• Tá cárta leighis iomlán agat
The exemption was due as long as you held a full medical card for some period during the year
Is féidir an díolúine a fháil chomh fada is atá cárta leighis ag an duine ar feadh roinnt tréimhse sa bhliain
Income not taken into account:
Ioncam nach gcuirtear san áireamh:
• Social welfare payments including those from abroad
• Íocaíochtaí leasa shóisialaigh lena n-áirítear cinn ó thar lear
• Health Service Executive payments including Foster Care Allowance
• Íocaíochtaí Fheidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte lena n-áirítear Liúntas um Chúram Altramais
• Community Employment Scheme and Job Initiative payments
• An Scéim Fostaíochta Pobail agus íocaíochtaí an Tionscnaimh Jabanna
• Back to Education Allowance
• Liúntas um Fhilleadh ar an Oideachas
• Income subjected to DIRT
• Ioncam atá faoi réir DIRT
Other sources of income may not be taken into account, for example, payments for personal injuries, Hepatitis C and Thalidomide
B’fhéidir nach dtógfaí foinsí ioncaim eile san áireamh, mar shampla, íocaíochtaí ar dhíobhálacha pearsanta, Heipitíteas C agus Tailídimíd
For a full list of income not taken into account see Revenue’s guidance notes on the income levy (pdf)
Chun liosta iomlán na n-ioncam nach dtógtar san áireamh a fheiceáil, féach ar nótaí treorach na gCoimisinéirí Ioncaim ar an tobhach ioncaim (pdf)
Redundancy payments are exempt to the same extent as they are for income tax
Bíonn íocaíochtaí iomarcaíochta díolmhaithe ar an mbealach céanna le cáin ioncaim
More information can be found on Revenue’s website
Tuilleadh eolais ar fáil ar láithreán gréasáin na gCoimisinéirí Ioncaim
Deductions were made by your employer weekly or monthly, depending on how you were paid
Déanann an fostóir asbhaintí go míosúil nó go seachtainiúil, ag brath ar an mbealach a dhéantar íocaíocht leat
Income levy deductions are not cumulative
Ní bhíonn asbhaintí an tobhaigh ioncaim carnach
Income levy rates were as follows:
Seo a leanas na rátaí don tobhach ioncaim:
• 2% on income up to €75,036
• 2% ar ioncam suas go dtí €75,036
• 4% on income from €75,037 to €174,980
• 4% ar ioncam ó €75,037 go dtí €174,980
• 6% on income above €174,980
• 6% ar ioncam os cionn €174,980
If your income was greater than the minimum threshold of €15,028 per year or €289 per week, you paid the levy on the full amount of your income
Má tá leibhéal ioncaim agat atá níos mó ná an íostairseach €15,028 ina aghaidh na bliana nó €289 in aghaidh na seachtaine, íocann tú an tobhach ar mhéid iomlán an ioncaim atá agat
(If you were aged 65 or over the minimum threshold was €20,000 per year for a single person and €40,000 per year for a couple)
(Má tá tú 65 bliana d’aois nó níos sine is é an t-íostairseach ná €20,000 in aghaidh na bliana i gcás duine singil agus €40,000 in aghaidh na bliana i gcás lánúine)
Married couples (under 65)
Lánúineacha pósta (faoi 65)
The income thresholds applied to each spouse individually and cannot be combined if one spouse is below the threshold and the other above
Baineann na tairseacha ioncaim le gach céile astu féin agus ní féidir iad a chur le chéile má bhíonn céile amháin faoi bhun na tairsí agus céile eile os cionn na tairsí
For example, if you earned €14,000 per year and your spouse earned €20,000 per year, you were not liable to pay the income levy but your spouse was

Mar shampla, má thuilleann tú €14,000 in aghaidh na bliana agus tuilleann do chéile €20,000 in aghaidh na bliana, ní bheidh tobhach ioncaim le híoc agat féin ach beidh tobhach ioncaim le híoc ag do chéile
PAYE taxpayers (under 65)
Cáiníocóirí ÍMAT (faoi 65)
Your employer calculated the income levy on a week by week or month by month basis
Ríomhann d’fhostóir an tobhach ioncaim ar bhonn seachtainiúil nó míosúil
If your income varied from week to week you could pay the income levy at a higher rate than you were actually liable to pay but in such a case you should get a refund
Má athraíonn d’ioncam go seachtainiúil, d’fhéadfá an tobhach ioncaim a íoc ag ráta níos airde ná mar atá dlite duit i ndáiríre, ach gheobhaidh tú aisíoc i gcásanna mar seo
│Your yearly income is less than €15,028
│Tá ioncam bliantúil agat atá níos lú ná €15,028
However, in July 2010 you get a bonus which means your │
Mar sin féin, faigheann tú bónas i mí Iúil a thugann d’ioncam os cionn an íostairsí seachtainiúil de €289
│income goes over the weekly minimum threshold of €289. The result is your full income that week is│
Bíonn ioncam iomlán na seachtaine sin faoi réir tobhaigh ioncaim dá réir
│At the end of the year, if your annual income is not more than €15,028 then you do not have to pay│ │the income levy
│Ag deireadh na bliana, más amhlaidh nach bhfuil ioncam bliantúil agat atá níos mó ná €15,028, ní chaithfidh tú tobhach ioncaim a íoc
│In this situation your employer should make an adjustment at the end of the year (week 52) and │ │refund all income levy deducted from your wages
│Ba chóir don fhostóir coigeartú a dhéanamh sa chás seo ag deireadh na bliana (seachtain 52) agus gach tobhach ioncaim atá asbhainte ó phá a aisíoc leat
If you have not worked with the same employer │ │continuously throughout the year Revenue will deal with any refund of income levy due at the end │ │of the year. │
Murar oibrigh tú leis an bhfostóir céanna go leanúnach i rith na bliana, socróidh na Coimisinéirí Ioncaim aisíoc ar bith maidir le tobhach ioncaim atá dlite duit ag deireadh na bliana.│
│The income levy is calculated on a weekly threshold of 2% for income up to €1,443, 4% from €1,443 │
│Déantar an tobhach ioncaim a ríomh ar thairseach sheachtainiúil de 2% ar ioncam suas go dtí €1,443, 4% ó €1,443 go dtí €3,365, agus 6% ar an gcuid eile
│to €3,365, and 6% on the balance. If you get a payment for one week in excess of €3,365 you will │ │pay the income levy at the 6% on the balance
Má fhaigheann tú íocaíocht ar feadh seachtain amháin atá níos mó ná €3,365 íocfaidh tú tobhach ioncaim ag 6% ar an gcuid eile
│If your yearly income means you are liable at a lower rate, you will have overpaid the income │
│Má chiallaíonn d’ioncam bliantúil go bhfuil tú dlite ag ráta níos ísle, beidh ró-íocaíocht déanta agat maidir leis an tobhach ioncaim
│levy. In this situation your employer should make an adjustment at the end of the year (week 52) │ │and make the appropriate refund
Ba chóir don fhostóir coigeartú a dhéanamh sa chás seo ag deireadh na bliana (seachtain 52) agus aisíoc cuí a dhéanamh leat
If you have over paid the income levy your employer should make an adjustment at the end of the year (week 52) and make the appropriate refund
Ba chóir don fhostóir coigeartú a dhéanamh ag deireadh na bliana (seachtain 52) má tá ró-íocaíocht déanta agat maidir leis an tobhach ioncaim agus aisíoc cuí a dhéanamh leat
If you have not worked with the same employer continuously throughout the year you should fill in an Income Levy Claim Form (pdf) and send it to your local Revenue office - see 'Where to apply' below

Murar oibrigh tú leis an bhfostóir céanna go leanúnach i rith na bliana ba chóir duit an Fhoirm Éilimh ar an Tobhach Ioncam (pdf) a chomhlánú agus í a chur isteach chuig d’oifig cánach áitiúil - féach ‘Cá háit a ndéanfaidh mé iarratas’ thíos
For further information on the income levy or to get a refund contact your local Revenue office
Chun tuilleadh eolais a fháil ar an tobhach ioncaim nó chun aisíoc a fháil, déan teagmháil leis na Coimisinéirí Ioncaim
Use the Revenue contact locator to find the Lo-call number for your region
Bain úsáid as aimsitheoir teagmhála na gCoimisinéirí Ioncaim le huimhir Lóghlao do réigiúin féin a fháil
You can find more detailed Revenue contact details for your region
Is féidir leat sonraí teagmhála níos mionsonraithe na gCoimisinéirí Ioncaim do do réigiún féin a fháil anseo
